title: Unhoused participants in the Denver Basic Income Project used their $1000/mo to...
content:
Unhoused participants in the Denver Basic Income Project used their $1000/mo to find jobs & housing, spent less time in ERs, and reported improved mental health. â€œA year later, nearly half of participants had housing.â€
